TEXT.TITLE: SRI LANKA TENDERING OVERNIGHT FOR WHEAT
TEXT.BODY: Sri lanka will tender overnight for 52,500 tonnes of U.S., Canadian and/or Australian wheats for April 8/16 shipment, under the Export Enhancement Program if U.S. origin, U.S. exporters said. Reuter
